dcterms:creator: P. Warden
dcterms:description: The Google speech commands dataset consists of 65,000 1-second long audio files sampled with 16 bit at 16 kHz sampling frequency. Each audio file contains one utterance of an English word spoken by one person, grouped into 30 different classes. The authors specifically use 10 classes for their experiments, along with an 'unknown' class and a 'silence' class.
dcterms:title: Google speech commands dataset
